thread.title: Penney’s Problem Is Not the Weather

author: Justin Lahart
title: Penney’s Problem Is Not the Weather
text:
Even when it is true, the weather is a bad excuse for poor results. The excuse looks even worse when a competing retailer says chilly temperatures didn’t affect its strong results.
That is the situation J.C. Penney found itself in Thursday, when it reported same-store sales rose by just 0.2% in its fiscal first quarter from a year earlier, versus the 2.1% analysts were looking for.
